metadata.title: USN-6666-1 -- libuv vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libuv incorrectly truncated certain hostnames. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue with specially crafted hostnames to bypass certain checks.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6666-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libuv1-dev - 1.43.0-1ubuntu0.1 libuv1 - 1.43.0-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
